price: ṣé ẹ̀yin l’ẹ̀ ń sọ̀ ọ́ kalẹ̀ láti inú ẹ̀ṣújò ni tàbí Àwa l’À ń sọ̀ ọ́ kalẹ̀?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anzaltumūhu mina al-muz'ni am naḥnu al-munzilūna
